title: Isabelle: Under Earth Book 1
description: Jacob Cross woke with a start! It was another nightmare. They were becoming more frequent now as time passed. The memory of Isabelle's disappearance haunted him every time he closed his eyes. He was sure her parents had covered something up, but he couldn't prove it. His parents wanted to believe him, but they didn't feel like they could, and were terribly concerned. He didn't know what to do. Then, one morning, he received a mysterious note. Little did he know, that note would change his life forever. It would send him on a journey to a supernatural world full of adventure and danger. Will he survive to rescue his friend? Will he reach her in time?
author: Nicholas Konz
